language.description: Allows you to change the language of the bot and reset it.

purge.description: Deletes the specified number of messages from the channel where the command is used.

message.title: Statistics

invite.description: Shows the bot's invite link, support server, Top.gg page and open source link.

botinfo.description: Shows the bot's versions and operating system in detail.

setnickname.description: Changes the nickname of the specified member.

removerole.description: Remove specified roles to specified members.

ban.description: Ban the specified member from the server.

play.description: Plays the music requested by the user on the voice channel.

message.max.queue.length: A queue can have up to 15 songs.

skip.description: Allows you to skip the currently playing song.

message.disconnection.problem: There was a problem disconnecting from the voice channel.

pause.description: Pauses the song playing on the voice channel.

message.already.paused: The music has already been paused.

resume.description: Resumes the song that was stopped on the voice channel.

message.not.paused: The music hasn't been paused yet.

loopqueue.description: Puts the queue into a loop.

loop.description: Puts the playing song into a loop.

stop.description: Allows you to terminate the playlist.

lyrics.description: Shows the lyrics of the song you're searching for.

volume.description: Allows you to set or see the volume of music.

message.range: Volume should be in the range of 0-200.
message.error: There was a problem setting the volume.

seek.description: Allows you to set the duration of music.

message.min: Duration must be at least 0 seconds.

queue.description: Lists the songs in the queue.

remove.description: Allows you to delete the song you specified from the queue.

message.range: Song number must be in the range of 1-15.
